member.name: T:MUnique.OpenMU.DataModel.Configuration.GameMapDefinition
member.summary: Configuration of a map. Contains all information to create an instance of a GameMap.
member.remarks: Some maps have different possible status, for expample the crywolf map: 1) Balgass is undeafeated - monsters are not dropping special items 2) Balgass is defeated - monsters are dropping special items 3) Crywolf event is ongoing - The normal monsters are not there(?), but event monsters. For each of this status, there exist different terrain maps (safezones are different, etc.). To reflect this requirement on this data model, for each status there must be one game map definition. The switch between this status and its corresponding game map definitions should be done in game logic.
